data.system_settings: ios 9.3.5, ipad 4th gen on latest testflight/stable build
data.actual_result: the channel loads nothing at all for a long time. Clicking to another channel will cause the previous channel to be losded in the newly selected one.
data.short_description: Channels containing excessive reactions take forever to load and sometimes glitch load into another channel
data.steps_to_repro: - find a channel containing thousands of reactions. - attempt to load it.
